name: Lakes Volume 1 Quiz | Physical Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the Great Lakes is entirely within the United States?
questions.explanation:
Michigan & Lake Michigan.

	All the others share a border between the U.S. and Canada.

questions.text: Lake of the Woods forms part of the border between Canada and which American state?
Which of the Great Lakes are Wisconsin's Apostle Islands in?
What is the deepest lake in the United States?
Which lake is entirely in New York State?
questions.explanation:
Lake George.

	Located at the foothills of the Adirondack Mountains in upper New York State.

questions.text: What country's two largest lakes are Lake Vanern and Lake Vattern?
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	Located in the south central lowland part of Sweden.

questions.text: What country's Lake Maracaibo is the largest in South America?
questions.explanation:
Venezuela.

	Located in the northwestern part.

questions.text: In which state is Lake Winnebago?
questions.explanation:
Wisconsin.

	It's located in the eastern part of the state and is the largest lake in the state.

questions.text: Which is the second largest of the Great Lakes in area?
questions.explanation:
Huron.

	Superior is the largest followed by Huron, Michigan, Erie and Ontario.

questions.text: In what state is Lake Okeechobee?
questions.explanation:
Florida.

	Located in southern Florida at the north of the Everglades.
